Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 58 (47) with seven fours and three sixes
Wanindu Hasaranga picked 3 wickets for 58 runs
Charith Asalanka picked 3 wickets for 30 runs
Dunith Wellalage scored 67* (65) with seven fours and two sixes
Post-Match Reflections: KL Rahul and Axar Patel stitched a crucial 57-run stand for sixth wicket off 94 balls
